column1:
--Simple CASE expression:   
    CASE input_expression   
         WHEN when_expression THEN result_expression [ ...n ]   
         [ ELSE else_result_expression ]   
    END   
    --Searched CASE expression:  
    CASE  
         WHEN Boolean_expression THEN result_expression [ ...n ]   
         [ ELSE else_result_expression ]   
    END
